message:
Match is redundant. It's recommended to rewrite it as 'if helper pattern
then
  let* xs = many p_pattern
   in
  let+ expr = (token "=") *> expr
   in
  {
    pvb_expr =
      (match xs with
       | [] -> expr
       | _ -> List.fold_right (fun f -> fun p -> Pexp_fun (f, p)) xs expr);
    pvb_pat = pattern
  }
else fail "Pattern name must be wildcard, variable or tuple of them"'
